actions.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 166 (Roll no. 182).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 166 (Roll no. 182).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Engel.

description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 116-42 to require the President's plan to take into consideration populations, regions, industries, and constituencies affected, including American jobs, consumer energy costs, and the ability to develop and deploy new technologies.
purpose: Amendment requires the President's plan to take into consideration populations, regions, industries, and constituencies affected, including American jobs, consumer energy costs, and the ability to develop and deploy new technologies.
